Package ohos.media.codec

Class CodecDescriptionList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.codec.CodecDescriptionList

  • public class CodecDescriptionList
extends Object
    Provides a MIME type list of media formats supported by codecs that are available for a device. You can use a method in this class to check whether the device supports the codec for a specified MIME type.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

      A constructor used to create a CodecDescriptionList object.

        public final List<CodecDescription> findDecoder​(Format format)

        Returns:

      • isDecodeSupportedByMime

        public static boolean isDecodeSupportedByMime​(String mime)
        Checks whether a device supports the decoder for the specified MIME type.
        Parameters:
        mime - Indicates the media format MIME type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the decoder is supported; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • isEncodeSupportedByMime

        Returns:
        Returns true if the encoder is supported; returns false otherwise.

      • isDecoderSupportedByFormat

        public static boolean isDecoderSupportedByFormat​(Format format)
        Checks whether a device supports the decoder for the specified media format.
        Parameters:
        format - Indicates the media format, for example, the audio format of a media file.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the decoder is supported; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
